text:
Hi everyone, is it possible to create a custom record id for an object?
please help me out, its urgent

Hi everyone

I need some help with one question about an integratiosn with Matillion.
How can we obtain the information of custom objects through an Oauth connection by a component dedicated to HubSpot?

Maybe someone to know about that? Thanks a lot
Im trying to edit the navigation on the new website but it says "the creator of this template prevented editing this module in the content editors"

Was there an update to the theme installed?

The module can be modified to allow changes at any time via dev tools, might want to check with your dev if it's a custom theme
We have purchased a theme and built 2 projects.  one project works perfectly but another project does not work perfectly.  This project we have cloned from the first project <@U03AKL6Q1B2>
It could have to do with the clone, if the header was overwritten
Have you reached out to the theme developer directly for support?
Yes,  But did not get a response <@U03AKL6Q1B2>
Is there any solution if we do not get help from theme developer ?
